list_definition.definition: (something) which is the smallest or the smallest amount that exists, is possible etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I think the least you can do is apologize!
She wanted to know how to do it with the least amount of bother.

list_definition.definition: (sometimes with the) to the smallest or lowest degree

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I like her (the) least of all the girls
That is the least important of our problems.
